de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.util

Class RingBuffer<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.util.RingBuffer<E>

  • public class RingBuffer<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a ring buffer implementation. It is severely limited in its capabilities.

    Supported operations include:
    * add(Object): overwrite the oldest element
    * get(int): get item at specific index
    * size() get the amount of elements currently stored in the container

    • Constructor Detail

      • RingBuffer

        public RingBuffer(int size,
                  E fillWith)
        Construct a new RingBuffer with the specified capacity
        Parameters:
        size - final size of this container
        fillWith - an element that should be in every point of this container

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public E get(int index)
        Get an item. Index 0 will always retrieve the newest item, while index (size - 1) will retrieve the oldest item.
        Parameters:
        index - the age index of the item; index 0 is the newest item, index (size - 1) is the oldest item.
        Returns:
        the value stored at the given age index

      • add

        public E add(E element)
        Add a new element, overwriting the oldest one. The overwritten element is returned.
        Parameters:
        element - the new element
        Returns:
        the overwritten element

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the number of elements in the ring buffer that were set by the user
        Returns:
        number of elements in the ring buffer that were set by the user
